11.eng-name: The Book of the Commencement of the Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Salamah said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to recite the Umm Al-Quran and two surahs in the first two rak'ahs of Zuhr and 'Asr, and he would make us hear a verse sometimes, and he used to make the first rak'ah of zuhr lengthy, and he did likewise in Subh

chapter.ara-name: باب الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي الرَّكْعَتَيْنِ الأُولَيَيْنِ مِنْ صَلاَةِ الْعَصْرِ
chapter.eng-name: Recitation in the first two rak'ahs of 'Asr
